document_data.name: Nolan
document_data.mainbody: Friar '''Nolan''' was a priest from [[Caer Corwell]] in the [[Moonshae Isles]] in the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The friar was a short fat man with a bald head.
document_data.Personality: Friar Nolan was a kind, benevolent shepherd of his flock. Being a believer in the gods of the [[Faerûnian pantheon]], Friar Nolan felt the wild revelry of the Moonshae [[druid]]s was blasphemous.
document_data.History: During the Festival of the [[Spring Equinox]] in the {{yearlinkName|1345}}, Nolan set up a white tent near the druid grove in Caer Corwell to preach the existence of gods other than the [[Earthmother]].
